question: Which public health facility received Rs 5 crore prize money as part of the Kayakalp Award Scheme for 2016-17?
option1: All India Institutes of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), New Delhi
option2: All India Institutes of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Raipur
option3: All India Institutes of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Jodhpur
option4: National Institute of Tuberculosis and Respiratory Diseases (NITRD), Delhi
answer: All India Institutes of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), New Delhi
